items.comment: A light easy drinker with a subtle sweetness from the honey. There are also some backend spice notes. definitely worth a try.

items.badge_description: Grab a beer and lose yourself to dance! Cut loose and boogie today with millions of people around the world celebrating International Dance Day, a day in celebration of dance - a universal art that brings people together just like beer!

Thanks for staying at home, and checking in with Untappd! It allows us to stay connected to a community of beer lovers, just like you, even if we can't be in the same physical location. From our home to yours, cheers and stay safe!
It's New Brew Thursday! Drink any beer you have never had before on three different Thursdays in a 20 day period.
One cannot live on dank hops alone. Tone down the bitterness and enjoy some smooth flavor. That's 105 different beers with an IBU of 20 or below. Try 5 more for Level 22!

We believe in IPA and you should too. You certainly have a taste for the hops! That's 85 different IPAs. Try 5 more for Level 18!

items.badge_description: Cheers, beer patriot! You are supporting the small and independent American craft brewer. When you see the seal -- shaped like an upside-down beer bottle -- that's independence you're tasting. Try 5 more to earn Level 90!

While spontaneity can be fun, sometimes you want to make sure your adventure will rock. Checkout the menu at an Untappd Verified Venue before visiting and know exactly what’s on tap! That's 325 check-ins at venue that is verified.  Try 5 more for Level 66!

Fresh from the tap is one of the best ways to enjoy a beer. Just try to use a glass and not drink directly from the tap, as tempting as it may be. That's 230 checkins with the serving style of Draft. Try 5 more for Level 47!
Keep the party rolling all day long with your favorite low ABV session IPAs. That's 5 different beers with style of IPA - Session / India Session Ale. Try 5 more for Level 2!

items.checkin_comment: 3.8. the vanilla adds a sweetnesses I haven't had in most brown ales.
